```{r}
# Build the DecoderTree from the Decoder_MasterList

DecoderTree = 
  data.frame()

for(dc in Decoder_MasterList) {
  DecoderTree = 
    rbind(
      DecoderTree,
      data.frame(
        make = dc()$metadata_map$make,
        model = dc()$metadata_map$model,
        class = class(dc())[[1]]
      )
    )
}


```
